TopicTitle: jet engines and other planetary bodies.

Articles.Content:
Well, after hours of assembling a rocket capable of carrying 2 dune buggies and 2 jet planes over to Duna, i learned the hard way that they don't work there despite the atmosphere, since it needs oxygen...DOH!

So are there any other planetary bodies besides Kerbin where jet engines work?

Have you checked the [wiki](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Atmosphere) lately? Jet engines work only on Kerbin and Laythe.

Edit: Ninja'd.

Well, technically jets work everywhere where there is a atmosphere. But they will give 0 thrust anywhere besides Kerbin and Laythe ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> Laythe.
> That's it.

thank you.

I have a ship with 2 jet planes uselessly orbiting Duna now, haha. I'm going to try and see if i have the fuel to take it all the way to Laythe.

![jkjccy.jpg](http://oi62.tinypic.com/jkjccy.jpg)

Well...at least i managed to land my Duna Buggies from space...
